TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public MustInherit Class XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs abstract : EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間 XSLT 處理時就會發生事件`xsl:message`樣式表中所指定。The event occurs during XSLT processing when an `xsl:message` is specified in the style sheet. > [!NOTE] > 如果`terminate`屬性設為`"yes"`，XSLT 處理器就會停止執行時，樣式表會停止處理訊息之後。If the `terminate` attribute is set to `"yes"`, the XSLT processor stops executing the style sheet stops after the message is processed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用顯示`xsl:message`內容至主控台。The following example uses the to display `xsl:message` content to the console. 此範例會將下列訊息寫入主控台： `Message received: Author name is not in the correct format Plato`。The sample writes the following message to the console: `Message received: Author name is not in the correct format Plato`. [!code-csharp[XsltMessageEncountered#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltMessageEncountered/CS/xsltmessageargs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltMessageEncountered#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltMessageEncountered/VB/xsltmessageargs.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列檔案做為輸入：The example uses the following files as input: books.xmlbooks.xml [!code-xml[XML_Core_Files#1](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XML_Core_Files/XML/books.xml#1)] message.xslmessage.xsl [!code-xml[XsltMessageEncountered#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltMessageEncountered/XML/message.xsl#2)]
